We have both 4 and 5 metre bell tents for boutique camping. These make great comfortable and fun places to stay in for a weekend.

All our bell tents are made of the finest cotton canvas which allows the tent to breath whilst keeping the elements out! They all have a fitted groundsheet and carpeted interior.

4 metre bell tent – €180 sleeps max 4/n5 metre bell tent – €260 sleeps max 6 Mattresses; €30 single/€50 Double
